thread.section_title: Life Style Sports Reviews | Customer Service Reviews of Life Style Sports | lifestylesports.com
thread.title: Sinead Mc Guinness
thread.title_full: Life Style Sports reviewed by Sinead Mc Guinness

author: Sinead Mc Guinness
title: Sinead Mc Guinness
text:
I was in lifestyle sports in Charlestown to buy a Dublin GAA top for my nephew. They did not have the specific one I wanted and the sales assistant (young lady) was really helpful and offered to order the top online for me and have it delivered either to my home or local lifestyle store.
I was delighted with the speed of the delivery, as it arrived the following day.
